projectDescription: Landscape design and installation — 4267 Avenue Del Mar, Carpinteria. Two areas: Area 1 (Beach front, Side of house, Beach front deck) and Area 2 (Entrance, Guest house front, Driveway, Tennis court, House deck). Original estimate dated 2/24/25.

plantMaterial.description: Beach front — 125 15gal plants, 250 5gal plants, 20 flats groundcover
Side of house — 2 24" box trees, 12 15gal plants, 65 5gal plants
Beach front deck — 3 24" box trees for containers, 60 1gal plants

laborAndServices.description: Demo, hauling, grading; Planting labor incl. organic planting soil; Irrigation materials and labor; Fertilize all plants
Meetings and installation supervision — billed at $175/hr

plantMaterial.description: Entrance / Left of driveway — 1 36" box tree, 3 24" box trees, 73 15gal, 85 5gal, 250 1gal
Front of guest house facing street — 42 15gal plants, 50 5gal plants
Tennis court area — Remove existing hedge & compost bins; 1 36" box tree in planter, 3 24" box citrus, 30 5gal plants
Tennis court fence facing house — 7 24" box camellia espalier, 20 5gal plants

laborAndServices.description: Remove existing plant material, grading, hauling; Planting labor incl. organic planting soil; Irrigation materials and labor; Fertilize all plants
* If new irrigation valves needed, price increases $800

notes: Original property total estimate: $168,568.00. Side of house plant costs appear included in Beach front subtotal. Meetings/installation supervision billed at $175/hr, Drawings billed at $75/hr — hours as needed.
